controls

Class StatusBarStop

  • java.lang.Object
    • controls.StatusBarStop

  • public class StatusBarStop
extends java.lang.Object
    Class StatusBarStop represents part on the status bar (fourth part from the top) displaying information about specific selected stop (position, name).
    Author:
    Michal Rein, Ondřej Motyčka

    • Method Detail

      • setStatus

        private void setStatus()
        Create layout, choice box and labels. Extract required values from StreetMap class.

      • switchStop

        public void switchStop(Stop stop)
        This method is called whenever new stop is requested to be displayed on status bar. Previously displayed stop must be unhighlight and the new one is highlighted and displayed on status bar.
        Parameters:
        stop - Stop class object that is required to be displayed.

      • resetStatus

        public void resetStatus()
        Set status to default values.
